improvementSuggestions: Tell us if there’s anything we can improve
entropyDescription: Entropy shows your current focus state on a scale from 0 to 1. The closer to 0, the deeper your focus.
entropyOverTime: Entropy also increases as time goes by.
wantToDiveDeeper: Want to dive deeper into flow with enflo?

privacy.title: enflo Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content:
enflo can be used without any sign-up or login.
The app may automatically collect the following information:
privacy.section1Item1Detail: Events during timer sessions (e.g., scroll activity, pause actions, entering background mode)
privacy.section1Item2Detail: Crash and exception reports collected through the Sentry SDK
privacy.section1Footer: All such information is stored locally on the user's device (e.g., SQLite database) and is not transmitted to any enflo server or external service.
privacy.section2Content: The collected data is used solely for the following purposes:
privacy.section2Item1: Providing timer and immersion tracking functionality
privacy.section2Item3: Enhancing user experience through statistical analysis
privacy.section3Item1: Activity and timer data are stored only within the user's device and are deleted when the app is uninstalled.
privacy.section3Item2: Sentry crash logs are stored anonymously on Sentry servers (U.S.) and are automatically deleted after a limited period (default 30 days).
privacy.section4Content:
enflo does not share any personal information with third parties.
However, anonymized crash logs may be transmitted to Sentry servers for the purpose of debugging and error analysis.
No personally identifiable data is included in these logs.
privacy.section5Item1: enflo does not collect or process any personal information.
privacy.section5Item2: All local data is securely stored according to iOS system security policies.
privacy.section5Item3: The app may request notification permission for its local trigger-based alerts. This permission is never activated automatically and requires explicit user consent.
privacy.section6Content:
Users may delete the app at any time to remove all locally stored data.
Notification permissions can also be modified or disabled via iOS settings.

terms.title: enflo Terms of Use
terms.section1Content: These Terms of Use ("Terms") define the rights, responsibilities, and obligations of users regarding the use of the enflo mobile application ("App").
terms.section2Item0: enflo provides a timer-based focus and immersion tracking feature.
terms.section2Item1: Recording focus sessions and timer activity
terms.section2Item2: Tracking in-app events (scroll, pause, background transitions)
terms.section2Footer: enflo may update, modify, or discontinue certain features to improve service quality.
terms.section3Item1: enflo can be used without any sign-up or account creation.
terms.section3Item2: Users may only use the app for personal and non-commercial purposes. Any illegal or commercial use is strictly prohibited.
terms.section3Item3: Users can modify notification permissions or delete the app at any time to stop using the service.
terms.section3Item4: enflo is not responsible for any data loss that occurs on the user's device.
terms.section4Item1: enflo does not collect or store any personal information.
terms.section4Item2: For error tracking, the app uses Sentry SDK, which collects anonymous crash data only.
terms.section4Item3: For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
terms.section5Item1: enflo is not responsible for any damages resulting from service interruptions, errors, or data loss.
terms.section5Item2: The app is not liable for issues caused by device settings, network conditions, or operating system changes.
terms.section5Item3: enflo is not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from app use.
terms.section6Item1: enflo reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time.
terms.section6Item2: Any changes will be announced through in-app notifications or update notes.
